title: 03/31/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/31/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Pro Day’s for NFL prospects preparing for the draft and why you shouldn’t overreact to what we’re seeing. He reacts to the NFL expanding the regular season to 17 games and how they continue to dominate the competition around the sports landscape. He also tries to figure out how UCLA went from barely qualifying for the NCAA tournament to a Final Four appearance. Plus, NBA Champion and analyst Antonio Daniels joins the show to call Colin out for trying to get Zion out of New Orleans already.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
